publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-326# Scott Barrie: Transportation of Coal—That the Parliament notes that Longannet is the last remaining deep pit left in the Scottish coalfield; regrets the apparent lack of sufficient capacity to transport coal on the national rail network; notes the increased transportation of imported coal and is concerned that this severely affects the Scottish coal industry by placing increased demands on the existing transportation infrastructure, and agrees to exert pressure to ensure that there is proper regulation of the railfreight industry.

S1M-326# Scott Barrie: Transportation of Coal—That the Parliament notes that Longannet is the last remaining deep pit left in the Scottish coalfield; regrets the apparent lack of sufficient capacity to transport coal on the national rail network; notes the increased transportation of imported coal and is concerned that this severely affects the Scottish coal industry by placing increased demands on the existing transportation infrastructure, and agrees to exert pressure to ensure that there is proper regulation of the railfreight industry. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*
S1M-326# Transportation of Coal (lodged on 25 November 1999) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-326# Transportation of Coal (lodged on 25 November 1999) Mr Nick Johnston*, David Mundell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Janis Hughes*
S1M-326# Transportation of Coal (lodged on 25 November 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Karen Whitefield*, Dr Richard Simpson*

S1M-326# Scott Barrie: Transportation of Coal—That the Parliament notes that Longannet is the last remaining deep pit left in the Scottish coalfield; regrets the apparent lack of sufficient capacity to transport coal on the national rail network; notes the increased transportation of imported coal and is concerned that this severely affects the Scottish coal industry by placing increased demands on the existing transportation infrastructure, and agrees to exert pressure to ensure that there is proper regulation of the railfreight industry. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Nick Johnston, David Mundell, Patricia Ferguson, Janis Hughes, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Karen Whitefield, Dr Richard Simpson
S1M-326# Transportation of Coal (lodged on 25 November 1999) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-326# Transportation of Coal (lodged on 25 November 1999) Phil Gallie*, Pauline McNeill*, Marilyn Livingstone*

Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Tricia Marwick, Nick Johnston, David Mundell, Patricia Ferguson, Janis Hughes, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Karen Whitefield, Dr Richard Simpson, Mr Keith Raffan, Phil Gallie, Pauline McNeill, Marilyn Livingstone, Cathie Craigie*, Kate Maclean*
